description: This file initializes a knowledge base and an agent for a web crawling and question-answering system, using asyncio for asynchronous operations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with a knowledge base to answer questions.

classes.name: FireCrawlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that uses web crawling data, stored in a vector database.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and retrieving embeddings.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads or reloads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the data.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
